bae50435-0923-488b-a581-8993f592ef92.name: 战斗反射
bae50435-0923-488b-a581-8993f592ef92.notes: Never freeze; +6 on all IQ rolls to wake up or to recover from surprise or mental stun; Your side gets +1 to initiative rolls (+2 if you're the leader)

545127c4-aeda-4242-aa93-f031ff19541e.name: 健康
545127c4-aeda-4242-aa93-f031ff19541e.notes: +1 to all HT rolls to stay conscious, avoid death, resist disease, resist poison; recover FP at twice the normal rate (but not FP spent for spells or psi powers)

a1872f09-21e5-4432-aa76-61dbc4f80875.name: Fit, Very
a1872f09-21e5-4432-aa76-61dbc4f80875.notes: +2 to all HT rolls to stay conscious, avoid death, resist disease, resist poison; recover FP at twice the normal rate; lose FP at half the normal rate (in both cases, not FP spent for spells or psi powers)

2b4dd1b8-10f6-42d3-bbb6-04bc13dd3bad.name: 高痛阈
2b4dd1b8-10f6-42d3-bbb6-04bc13dd3bad.notes: Never suffer shock penalties when injured; +3 on all HT rolls to avoid knockdown and stunning; +3 to resist torture

b5856edc-6826-42b7-87c3-dcb307cf2054.name: 幸运
b5856edc-6826-42b7-87c3-dcb307cf2054.notes: 游戏的每个小时可用一次

10d5391e-6809-4456-b15a-01f8a830f46a.name: Off-Hand Weapon Training (@Weapon@)
10d5391e-6809-4456-b15a-01f8a830f46a.notes: Replaces equal-named technique on p. B232

bf38c2f3-d06b-4f8d-8627-006cf342a6b3.name: 标志性装备
bf38c2f3-d06b-4f8d-8627-006cf342a6b3.notes: Gear is worth (starting wealth)/10 per level

f613574f-a3cd-4d8b-8ae7-434d0adc981d.name: Judo
f613574f-a3cd-4d8b-8ae7-434d0adc981d.notes: 使得你获得每轮用两只手各招架一次的能力。
